member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_RANGE_INFO
member.summary: Represents the accepted range, step value, and default value for a camera control.

member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_RANGE_INFO.minValue
member.summary: The minimum value supported by the control.

member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_RANGE_INFO.maxValue
member.summary: The maximum value supported by the control.

member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_RANGE_INFO.stepValue
member.summary: The incremental step value supported by the control.

member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_RANGE_INFO.defaultValue
member.summary: The default value for the control.
